Articles.Content: Well, sadly I have been unable to play KSP for quite some time now, since right after the .24 release. My computer died and we didn't get a new one until just the other day. So I finally have KSP again! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) and I jumped 2 updates, from .24 to .90, so It's taking a bit to get used to, but it's amazing. Also it's a pretty decent computer with an i5 in it. Glad we got this computer before 1.0. Also, tomorrow I'm getting my own laptop (this desktop is my parents) and this laptop is even better, with an 8 core i7 and a geeforce GT 720 or something similar. Can't wait! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome (back) to the forums! 

Oh, and if you didn't know - attempt knocking a building down.. And stuff will happen. You know.. explosions.

But anyways.. It's great for you to be back!

Well I've been on the forums still, this was more of a I'm back in the game kind of thing. And yeah I've kept up with every devnote since august of 2013 ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) so I know eeh bit about developement. Thanks anyways though!
Welcome back! I didn't realize I missed you until I recognized your avatar again. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Yeah, welcome back! Wanna stop bragging about your new equipment?! I'm jealous

> 
> Welcome back! I didn't realize I missed you until I recognized your avatar again. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

It's weird and cool being recognized online. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Welcome back, friend!

Thanks!

> 
> Yeah, welcome back! Wanna stop bragging about your new equipment?! I'm jealous

heh, sorry. I would've been jealous too. I got that laptop for $499. it cost $1350 new, so I never would've imagined getting a computer like it, but we got it at a computer refurbishing place. This guy turned his house into a computer store and refurbishes computer equipment. So if you are looking for an upgrade, my advice is to find a small computer shop like that, maybe trade in your old rig and get a refurbished computer. You might just end up with a better computer than the one I mentioned earlier! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Should've asked me to build ya one. I could mail it to you. Fun. 

Anyway, WB, nice to see ya again. 

I should have posted my own return thread. Funny we solved are computer troubles at around the same time

> 
> It's weird and cool being recognized online. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hopefully not *too* Ã¢â‚¬â€¹weird. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hi! Welcome back, we are awesome.

Welcome back to the forums! Hope you enjoy your stay!

(And yes I have a avatar!)
